About.Head: MORE ABOUT ME ©
About.Text1: I’m Ali Ismayıl, a Product Owner who turns business needs into simple and usable digital products.
About.Text2: I’ve been working as a Product Owner for 1+ year, combining both technical understanding and strong soft skills. I’ve been involved in delivering 20+ websites across different industries — from company pages to digital menu systems and brand landing pages. My focus is always clear requirements, correct prioritization and creating real business value — not just visuals.

Connect.Head: LET'S WORK TOGETHER
Connect.Text: Hi, I’m Ali — a Product Owner focused on clarity, measurable outcomes, and web products that feel effortless to use.
